reference.title: Adding diagnostic messages
reference.shortdesc: Plug-in specific warning and error messages can be added to the set of messages supplied by DITA-OT.

dlentry.dd: Add new messages to diagnostic message file.

example.p: To add your own messages, create the message in an XML file myMessages.xml:
example.codeblock: <dummy> <!-- See resource/messages.xml for the details. --> <message id="myMessageId" type="WARN"> <reason>...</reason> <response>...</response> </message> </dummy>
example.p: And incorporate them with the extension:
